website_summaries.verdict: If the price is right, you don't need to look any further than the Samsung 830 series to upgrade your computer's internal storage to the best possible performance.
pros: The 2.5-inch SATA 3 (6Gbps)-based Samsung 830 series solid-state drive offers great performance, is well-built and good-looking
The drive comes with helpful desktop software for Windows
cons: Due to the thin profile, the Samsung 830 series requires padding or a laptop kit, which costs extra, to fit in most existing laptop computers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speed and fairly easy install.
customer_reviews.text: This product was fairly easy to clone. I am not a tech guy by any means. I followed a video posted by samsung on youtube on how to clone and install this on my mid 2012 i5 13inch macbook pro. The only problem was that the video provided by samsung is not going to be exactly the same on a new macbook with mountain lion. Just be aware of that. Also, after everything was installed and the ssd was working I noticed a slow startup but everything else was super fast. To fix this problem go to system preferences- startup disk and choose the sad. Boot up time went from 45 sec to 12 sec. Hope this helped! Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: RLCC

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 256GB SSD with Norton Ghost
customer_reviews.text: This is my first SSD and I was a bit hesitant about installing it based on some of the other reviews. However, there were exactly ZERO problems. The disk arrived on time with all the materials as advertised. The instructions were sparse and in different files, but when I followed them everything went well. The product was installed in my wife's laptop which has just started getting disk errors. So far she is really happy with how fast the laptop boots and initiates programs. I will definitely be purchasing another of these SSDs for my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Put this in a Toshiba Portege R705-P35 a few months ago, and this this is AWESOME! Fastest boot time was 14 seconds, that's all the way to the desktop with everything loaded and ready to go, average is around 18 seconds. I've done the performance optimization about 5 or 6 times now, and the read and write speeds just keep getting faster and faster! It really helped cut down on heat, sound, and battery usage also. Absolutely no buyer's regret on this one. Recommended to all!
customer_reviews.author: Banditface

customer_reviews.title: Great hard drive
customer_reviews.text: I always trust Samsung with my electronics needs. I never had any problem with them. I read somewhere that some macbook pros ship with samsung hard drives, and since I wanted this to replace my macbook pro's rotating hdd I bough it. I hasn't let me down and I bought it more than 1 year ago. I actually bought 2 of this, and installed the second one in a lenovo thinkpad T500 without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ulises Bocchio

customer_reviews.title: Fast and great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first SSD and I am impressed. Installation was easy. I did a clean install so I haven't had to use the cable or Norton ghost. I just exchanged the HDD with the SSD. Used the windows recovery disks my laptop came with and everything was flawless.I installed the Samsung magician software and that deactivated everything that could slow down the SSD like defragmentation, system restore etc.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gymnopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Blazing fast
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my Vostro 3750 business laptop to give me a performance advantage while running bitlocker. I must say, I am impressed with how much of a speed difference this made over the hard drive that came with the laptop. The second reason I purchased this was due to the perceived reliability from a laptop that will get moved around and no moving parts to go bad in the hard drive. It's too soon to comment on the reliability factor, but the speed factor alone is the first time I can truly call a notebook a viable desktop replacement. I look forward to tax season 2012!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB_70809

customer_reviews.title: Best Computer Upgrade you could ever do
customer_reviews.text: This was the single best thing I've ever done to a computer of any kind. I work in IT and have access to limitless resources, so please take my word for it. You could throw a thousand gig's of memory at a computer, but if the hard drive sucks, it won't matter. If you are tired of anything more than 1 minute boot up times or slow application response times, get this hard drive. The 128gb version doesn't have the staggering numbers this one has, but it works great as well. GET THIS! YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED, I PROMISE!
customer_reviews.author: milkwrx

customer_reviews.title: My recipient was happy with this product could have better instructions how to install it.
customer_reviews.text: The product met mine and my gift recipients expectations and it was shipped quickly. It would be nice to have more information how to install the drive. After my husband got the drive in his laptop he was very pleased how fast the drive was. He is very happy with the drive. It took a while to ghost image his old hard drive. After that it went very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I installed this into my Samsung series 7 17.3" with the spacer. Works really well, I love it. I did not use the Norton ghost, and only really bought the laptop kit for the spacer, but the SATA/USB adapter is very cool and much nicer than the one I've been using. I did a clean install of Windows onto the SSD. I also moved the factory HDD into the optical drive bay via a caddy.
customer_reviews.author: peterbee

customer_reviews.title: Met and exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The installation was simple and easy. It is worth it to note Samsung recommends a clean Windows install which makes the process longer but not impossible. I thought my laptop was already quick. This has turned it into a rocket. I also like the idea that the SSD is encrypted for an extra layer of security. I am looking for an excuse to get one for my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M

customer_reviews.title: Quick load time, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Forewarning, I bought this with the intention of fresh booting windows 8 on it, not cloning a hard drive. I've always had nightmare experiences with cloning, and fresh boots just seem better to me. The load times on this thing are really fast (I went from 80 second boots to 12) and I've had no problems with it glitching at all.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD
customer_reviews.text: This SSD has been my main hard drive (OS) for over 2 years and is still working great, Samsung magician says i have written over 2 TB but it is still 99% good. I was planning to get a new SSD but this one will last me 10+ years and it is fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Starcraft2WOOT

customer_reviews.title: Great for Virtual
customer_reviews.text: Loving this 256GB SSD. I purchased it primarily to run VMWare workstation on my laptop to test out softare installs on VMs prior to installing on live systems. Previously had a 250 7200 Sata drive (8GB on 64 bit windows 7). couldnt run 2 VM's and run my workstation at the same time without the system bogging down. Now I can easily run 3 vms AND use my laptop without any issues what-so-ever. Super fast power on and shut downs for both my VM's and laptop OS. I didnt use the Ghost software. I only purchased the laptop kit because of the spacer. My final answer....I love this drive. Will you marry me Samsung SSD830?
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Offhaus

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: I did not even try to use the software that came with the drive - I used their cable and downloaded cloning software directly from Samsung (free) and it did everything I needed. The whole process was easy - I changed out the drive in an old Acer laptop and I feel like I have a new computer - it never booted this fast.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: samsung SSD is a good thing in my case!
customer_reviews.text: SSD's are young, they seem to have tempers. Samsung is considered high quality all throughout the interwebs. what? 2-3 months I've had it? still works like a charm, mind you that that's not a very long time. Hook it up and fill it up, on windows 8 just like that! None of the hassle of having to read or learn about it at all in order to operate it. How can I complain? If it breaks before a long time, i will rescind all opinions on it and may even generate new ones, I doubt anyone who reads this will find out what those will be though, especially if they never happen.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a year and still works well, pretty fast as you know it's the infamous 830 unit. I use this for my C drive on a Windows machine.
customer_reviews.author: fUji

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Drive!
customer_reviews.text: This slightly older Samsung drive (840 is the latest) is amazingly fast. I love it and highly recommend it. It makes boot-up take one fourth or less the time it used to take, and programs load amazingly fast. Samsung makes some of the best SSDs in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Breslin

customer_reviews.title: Great drives, fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these drives, they are slim (so fit in laptops like the Lenove T420s) unlike Crucial M4 etc. I have two of these they are super fast and seem more reliable than the crucial ones and others i have owned. Oh and the free batman is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Balcanquall

customer_reviews.title: Incredable performance
customer_reviews.text: I installed the Samsung 830 HD in a 10 year old Sony Vaio notebook running Windows XP. As expected, the performance improved dramatically. No regrets with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Good Drive for the money
customer_reviews.text: Measured performance in my laptop - Asus G75VW: Seq. Read = 518 MB,s Seq Write = 383 MB/s Ran. Read = 73,817 IOPS Ran Write = 36,153 IOPS Used Samsung SSD Magician performance benchmark to test
customer_reviews.author: Troy E

customer_reviews.title: Best SSD Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to install it into my MacMini (2011). Let me just say, it's AWESOME. From the time I hit the power button, to the time I get to the Logon screen, is less than 20 seconds! Not to mention Apps launch fast! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: USMCguy

customer_reviews.title: Blazing Fast and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this hard drive after my HDD failed on me. Easy to install and transfer files with the provided transfer tools. I was amazed at how quick this little bugger is. Restarting my computer is no longer a hassle, it is a breeze. Got an amazing deal on it from Amazon, which finally gave me an affordable SSD. I have sworn to never go back to hard disk drives after seeing how amazing this SSD is after my HDD failed. Can't go wrong with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: ReviewBoard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SSD
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe the price when I saw it - super fast shipping - product works fantastically, this is my third Samsung 830 series SSD and I absolutely love them
customer_reviews.author: Boz

customer_reviews.title: This is the best upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I opted to install this drive instead of upgrading my late 2008 Macbook Unibody. Applications open in a few seconds instead of taking 10 -15 seconds. Start up is very quick. Seems to have increased battery life slightly. Should keep my laptop alive for 2 more years at least before it will be retired as a backup machine.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and speedy
customer_reviews.text: I used this for over a year now on my MacBook Pro Unibody. I had concerns initially about the drive not purging deleted files ..etc but that is all put to rest. The drive is super fast and reliable. I did not have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Elshamaa

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Works fine thought I did find an old operating system on it so it was probably used.
customer_reviews.author: Gabor

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Great performance! I'm a little late to the review game, now Samsung has the 840 line out. If you are looking for a fast SSD buy the Samsung 840 Pro, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: FAST. Just plain FAST. I put this in my laptop and my boot up went from about 2 min to about 15 seconds. Everything runs fast now.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond V. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Have 2 of these hard drives and super fast and have not have one fail over 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of these hard drives and super fast and have not have one fail over 2 year period. Couldnt ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: conceptvip

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware, out of date software
customer_reviews.text: The SSD itself works wonderfully. It is fast and works well. However, the provided Norton Ghost software doesn't work with Windows 8. As a result, it took me two full days to figure out how to clone my HDD to the SSD.
customer_reviews.author: pianodude1193

customer_reviews.title: Perfect after a year
customer_reviews.text: So, it's been a year and 10 days since I installed this thing. Haven't had a single problem (that I know of), and life has been fast and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fast hard drive
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive is fast and reliable. I gave this as a gift to my boyfriend for Christmas. He installed it into a Dell 2009 Studio laptop. Def a great upgrade for a laptop. I would recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chrzan

customer_reviews.title: SSD Review
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and well worth the money. It is extremely fast and it does not require defragmentation. It boots my systme in about 20 seconds flat.
customer_reviews.author: John Felton Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, amazing performances
customer_reviews.text: The upgrade is very easy: just copy the existing hard drive with the Norton software provided. Replace the drive and you get a very fast computer. Speed difference is amazing from a traditional hard drive. I strongly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Payannet

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and no issues after two and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast, easy to use and no issues after two and a half years.
customer_reviews.author: Home Trade

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from 500GB HD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this SSD drive to replace a brand new 500GB drive that came with my Lenovo x230. Swaping the two was a snap and I haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I have this drive for a while, I only wish it had higher capacity :) The performance is very good and I didn't notice any slowdown while using it over a year.
customer_reviews.author: sadyc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the standard HDD in my laptops with this and all I can say is, WOW! Windows 7 startup has has been between 15 and 40 seconds depending upon the installed anti-virus program. All other processes are likewise sped up. Be sure to disable defrag to increase the like of your SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Ithacles

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after two years
customer_reviews.text: My SSD stopped working after two years. Not sure what happened, and I am not able boot it up. Also, I am not sure, how the reach Samsung for their advertised 3 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Good drive
customer_reviews.text: I have had this drive for a few months now, no problems. Installed in my thinkpad with a nice fit. It has a nice cable for connecting externally.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST SSD RIGHT AWAY AS GOOD AS INTEL MAYBE BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SSD
customer_reviews.text: I have many SSD's by many manufacturers. This (Samsung) is the fastest and most importantly (so far) the most reliable.
customer_reviews.author: The Most Toys Wins

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast!
customer_reviews.text: The difference between a traditional HD and this drive is night and day. Everything is about 4x faster. Very happy..
customer_reviews.author: David Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: This SSD is very fast. Installed it into my new desktop as the primary (boot) disk with Windows 7 64-bit and the Windows rates it as 7.9 (in the 1.0-7.9 range). Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Starwalker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Installing was a breeze, had windows installed within 10 mins. This drive is incredibly fast and i have never seen my computer move this fast. Will purchase another one for my other computers.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. The hardware is fantastic, fast, and sleek. Norton Ghost takes a bit to figure out if your previous drive doesn't have one of the "standard" partition setups.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came a few days after order. Item has exceptional value. Since I was doing a clean OS install. Got factory set recovery with A flash drive from Toshiba. Have Windows 7 Premium and did a dual-boot with a new partition. Instructions on Web. Very fast. Just bought the Samsung 840 SSD. Right now difference is not noticeable noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Tech Rock

customer_reviews.title: Fastest drive ever!
customer_reviews.text: This hard drive is AMAZING! Photoshop opens in 3 seconds, InDesign in 5 seconds, and Lightroom in 3 SECONDS. I'll never have anything other than a SSD again. Don't know why I waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: niknik

customer_reviews.title: Works great in a Lenovo X130e
customer_reviews.text: This SSD works great in a Lenovo X130e. The 7mm size is required and this SSD fits the bill. Install process: 1. Remove the existing HD. You only need a small Phillips screwdriver. 2. Install the new Samsung SSD. 3. Use the Lenovo recovery CDs to load the OS and recovery partitions on the new SSD. 4. Use the software that comes with the SSD to "tune" the SSD and add the 23GB work partition. That is it. It was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, the usb cable was very useful, it was recognized by the system without any problem. So far I don't have any complaints regarding this disk. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco ZS

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this SSD to replace a failed Crucial M4 model. So far so good and I really do like the Samsung software that comes with it that check to make sure all the power and Windows settings are correct to get the most of the drive.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: great product, shipped very fast
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this SSD, installed easily and works great. Instructions were written so anyone can understand. Product came sooner than I expected
customer_reviews.author: pmjc

customer_reviews.title: Great Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for at least a month and have not had any issues with it yet. Really easy to get everything transferred over.
customer_reviews.author: WolfenAce

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to transfer data as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The drive is blisteringly fast, as advertised. Laptop boots in 40 seconds (all-told) vs almost four minutes. But, my laptop (Dell Inspiron) wouldn't recognize the SSD when connected with the included USB-SATA cable/adapter, regardless of whether I used the USB 2.0 or 3.0 ports. Ended up having to buy a fresh copy of Win7 and starting over from scratch. (Thank goodness for my Student discount.)
customer_reviews.author: Bob Downs

customer_reviews.title: Deffective
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 1 week then quit working. Had to un-install it, send it back, now waiting for a replacement. We'll see how that works.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Grace

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and ease
customer_reviews.text: Now the SSD came in a pretty clumbsy package, but I did notify Amazon and hopefully this is fixed. The SSD was still good, they can take a beating, I was able to set it up with ease. I bought a new toshiba laptop and repalced the HD with this. THe PC boots in secs and access my vmware quickly. Have not seen any slowness, besides viruscanner running, but hey, thats the norm. This is my first SSD, so only rated it a 4 out of 5, but I do recommend this Drive. Very solid, very reliable, and ease of setup.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Never made it through the install
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this would be an excellent product if it functioned properly. I never made it all the way though a Lion install. I kept trying to repartition as well as try alternate install methods (through the SATA to USB adapter, connected to another computer, target disk mode, etc...). Return process was very easy, just as you would expect from Amazon. I love you, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Caswell

customer_reviews.title: The invisible drive
customer_reviews.text: Package, delivery and product looks are excellent. Only problem was that the drive was invisible to all three of my computers, two win-xp and one win-7. Thanks to Amazon return policy, I din't have to shelve this drive in file 13.
customer_reviews.author: picJR

product_meta.title: Samsung MZ-7PC256N/AM 830 Series 256G Internal SSD Laptop Kit With Norton Ghost 15
product_meta.description: The Samsung SSD 830 Series boasts superior random read speeds and faster sequential read and write speeds (up to 520 MB/s & 400 MB/s respectively). It's the ideal solution for your everyday computing needs, such as web browsing, document creation, viewing or editing multimedia files, playing PC games, etc. As the world's #1 DRAM, NAND Flash, and SSD supplier, Samsung has unique, industry-leading engineering resources, technologies, and manufacturing processes as well as more stringent quality and testing standards. All Samsung SSDs are designed and built completely in-house. Optimized for exceptional, sustained performance, the 830 Series features unrivaled reliability through its specially-engineered wear-leveling and garbage collection algorithms. The Samsung SSD 830 Series features stunning design and precision engineering – inside and out. It measures only 7mm thick, so it can even accommodate the latest ultra-slim laptop PCs. Magician Software Samsung's SSD Magician software eliminates the confusion and uncertainties of SSD management, making it simple for users to maximize the performance and lifetime of their Samsung SSD. The Samsung SSD 830 series is available with both desktop and laptop installation kits. The desktop kit comes with SATA data and power cables, screws, and a 2.5” to 3.5” adapter bracket. The laptop kit includes a SATA to USB adapter cable to facilitate easy data migration and a mounting spacer so that laptops with traditional 9.5mm drive bays can accommodate the Samsung SSD 830 Series' new slim profile. All Samsung SSD 830 Series models include a full version of Norton Ghost 15.0, rather than the limited data migration utilities included with most SSDs today. In addition to its robust data migration features, Norton Ghost 15.0 offers
feature_bullets: Enables you to boot up your computer in as little as 15 seconds
Energy efficient - improve your battery life by up to 30 minutes
Outstanding Multitasking Performance - It's the ideal solution for your everyday computing needs, such as web browsing, document creation, viewing or editing multimedia files, playing PC games, etc.
Superior Reliability - from the world's #1 DRAM, NAND Flash and SSD Supplier, all Samsung SSD's feature 100% genuine Samsung components

Industry-leading Design - Stunning design and precision engineering - inside and out. Brushed metal case blocks dust and corrosion and it measures only 7mm thick, so it can even accommodate the latest ultra-slim laptop PCs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars125 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
